data.text: This hotel offers poor accommodation, gym not functioning, little facilities. And at least in feb, A/C is not functioning, rooms are real sona. You can open the balcony door but you have all the noise of the motorway and in my case the smell of cigarettes from the neighbors room. First and last time in this hotel for sure.
data.title: Welcome to sauna room

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,  

Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting your expectations.  

We would like to explain that during the winter season, cold mode is not active in the air conditioner in our hotel.

Due to the renovation in our hotel, our gym is closed for a few days, but if you give information to the reception, you can use another gym next to our hotel,   

As you still stay at Four Points by Sheraton Izmir, please inform the reception if you would like to use the gym, we will be very happy to asist you.

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  

Best Regards.
owner_response.author: Four Points by Sheraton Izmir

data.text:
Four Points by Sheraton is a very convenient and neat hotel in case you are a little bit familar with İzmir. The rooms are clean and spacious with balcony, and more importantly, all personnel are very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. 

The hotel is centrally located near the Bayraklı courthouse area, and is within 10 minutes walking distance to 'Stadyum' metro station. 

The only shortcoming of Four Points Sheraton is its lack of its own parking space. In case you arrive by car, you may have difficulty in finding a parking spot inside the garage of the Mistral residence/shopping center. In that case, the hotel personnel kindly park your car (even though the hotel does not provide any valet service)
data.title: A recently discovered gem in İzmir

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for your review on Four Points by Sheraton Izmir after your recent stay with us. 
We are happy to see that you had enjoyed your experience overall and appreciate your feedback.
We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future. 
Sincerely,
owner_response.author: Four Points by Sheraton Izmir

data.text: Beautiful place and overlook the city and port... Nice and clean hotel with goo breakfast. I'd like to stay at this hotel again this year. However, the hotel homepage said no parking available but Tripadvisor say free parking. The hotel has free parking?
data.title: Parking

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for your review on Four Points by Sheraton Izmir after your recent stay with us. 
We are happy to see that you had enjoyed your experience overall and appreciate your feedback.
As for your question, our hotel does not have its own private parking space.But you can take advantage of the free parking lot of the complex we are in.
We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future. 
Sincerely,
owner_response.author: Four Points by Sheraton Izmir

data.text:
Terrible disappointment with Four Points by Sheraton Izmir's customer service and attitude. We were given the wrong info (cost-related) for a tour we signed up upon check-in. For English-speaking users, please be aware that there is only ONE staff who was able to communicate in basic English (this is important if you are signing up for anything or require *any* information). We ended up paying *double* of what was agreed. In cash.
I followed up with an email requesting that they look into the incident but there was no sincere effort to address my concerns and provide appropriate compensation. We were just told that the info they gave was correct and no efforts on their end to share how the case was investigated or a follow up. Highly disappointing for such a reputable brand.
data.title: Terrible Customer Service & Attitude

data.text: While this hotel is set away from many of the tourist spots, it is a good hotel and easy to reach to by taxis and a metro station about a 10 minute walk. The service at the hotel was excellent. The front of house team was superb and Melike and her team were welcoming and most helpful. Housekeeping was of high standards as was the restaurant at breakfast. We had a small problem with our balcony door which could not be resolved on our first evening, so we were moved to a new room immediately and the hotel staff followed up with us to ensure that we settled well in our new room. The service at the hotel was excellent.  Thank you to the team for a comfortable stay.
data.title: Visiting Izmir

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for your review on Four Points by Sheraton Izmir after your recent stay with us. 
We are happy to see that you had enjoyed your experience overall and appreciate your feedback.
We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future. 
Sincerely,
owner_response.author: Rabia Ates
